reviews.review:
Easily the best movie of all time.
100 out of 10.
Will watch again.
Go buy every ticket there is

There are movies. There are good movies. There are movies that will go down in history, like CCSTK and Sharknado IV, just the greatest movies. No matter what the haters say, this movie will be great, huge, big. Probably the best movie made about emojis this year! The only better movie is avatar, the last airbender. Patrick Stewarts roll as p00p was legitamitagemally the best ever. This is a must watch movie, especially for adult children.
BEST move ever made, jokes are perfect (though there isn't enough jokes, there should've been more) made me laugh until my stomach hurt
Best movie i've ever seen, it made me want to try out the Just Dance app, now free on Android and IOS. Not enough poop jokes, tho.

The Emoji Movie should be the last film you ever watch. Truly it shouldn't be one of the last thing she you experience in you're life. After you've experienced something so beautiful everything else in life will feel meaningless. Absolutely nothing comes close to the feeling you get when you watch this movie, not marriage, not intercourse, not even having a child. Truly this experience has caused me to peak at a young age, and I don't think life is worth living anymore, but it's all worth it because I know that I got to experience this. We live in a 13 trillion year old universe, on a 5 Billion year old chunk of rock flying around in space in the perfect location to harbor life, life evolved for 3 Billion years and humanity has been around for 2 million, and I am lucky enough to be one of the few things alive in all of existence that will be able to experience this movie. Thank you for making me Christian again.

They say art is subjective,  so of course true art like this will get mixed views dependent on how people view and feel it. I would personally give it a 10/10 for humour, character development, plot and creativity. After classics like angry birds the movie I didn't think sony could top that but good job sony you've done it and you've won yourself a fan.
I haven't seen this movie and never will but Gene looks thicc

From the beginning I knew this monstrosity of a film will recive a lot of negative reviews. I personally thought that it'll just run fir a short period of time and I didn't think that it will be THAT bad. But, I was WRONG! 

How do you even call this piece of that *poop emoji* a movie!? It has no likeable characters, an unoriginal story, bad animation, jokes that 3 year old kids WOULDN'T EVEN LAUGH at them, an overrated massage that wasn't deliverd in a creative way but it's shoved down to your throat, dumb advertisments, and the worst of them all is that this "movie" could take a place instead of an actual great movie! (For example, not everyone got to see Kubo and the two strings, but Norm of the north had a WORLDWIDE RELEASE. Do you realize how stupid is that?)

In short: I don't recommend this film to enyone, kids deserve movies better than this, nobody asked for it and it's entire existence is just cashing in from 5 year old kids that don't know eny better.

I'm sometimes ashamed of the world that we live in.
Score: 0.5/5
